name: Home Guards
description:
FPS Shooting Action Game, That talks about the war against the Terrorist organization Daesh.

Daesh the most terrorist organization in the world, occupied many places in the Iraq and Syria.

They destroyed every things on their way, And killed every one talked against them, They don't know anything about the meaning of the word PEACE , They are just monsters ...

You have the duty to stop the terrorists and bring peace back to to the place that was under their occupied of Daesh.

You will fight the terrorists in 5 different stages to achieve the victory.
3 Stages : Attacking enemies centers
1 Stage  : Stopping enemies attacks
1 Stage  : Using a helicopter to destroy the enemies vehicles

You have many weapons that will help you with your missions

We're counting on you ..
